column4: uname -a will only create one line of output, why cant he just paste it here?
I had intended to say paste.  I guess my fingers are just doing whatever they want.
pastebin is just a default reponse for most people that have experienced stupid people trying to paste things like there x config file into irc haha
he'll probs go back to app when ge realises he needs several dependencies :)
thanks for telling me where my home folder is, Without that info I would of surely lost my Uni research
That's not quite the point of that factoid.  And please lose the attitude
adding launchpad PPA that some OOo devs setup
Alright, first: remove the PPA from your sources, then remove everything you got from that PPA, then reinstall OOo
done, keep getting errors from synaptic when i try to re-install saying something like: openoffice.org-core-xxx depends on openoffice.org-writer but writer will not be installed
sudo apt-get update after you remove them from your sources.
If theres further issues, be sure you didn't forget to remove something (completely, via purge, or "complete removal" in synaptic)
same problem, I'm going to double check everything is removed
If you still have the issue, let me know, we can look into specifics.
thanks, I'm making sure/ double checking all packages are purged
looks there was a language pack from the ppa that I missed
thanks for the prompt to check if all packages were removed, sorted it and know OOo is working normally :)
